scripts.build:lib: npm run build:ver; find src -name "*.js" | sort | xargs cat > ./pico.js
scripts.build:app: if [ -n "${npm_config_main}" ]; then mkdir -p ../${npm_config_main}; cp pico.* index.* ../${npm_config_main}; for app in app/${npm_config_main}.js*; do cp $app ../${npm_config_main}/app.${app##*.}; done; fi
scripts.build:sub: if [ -n "${npm_config_main}" ] && [ -n  "${npm_config_sub}" ]; then mkdir -p ../${npm_config_main}/app; for sub in ${npm_config_sub//,/ }; do cp app/$sub.js ../${npm_config_main}/app/; done; fi;
scripts.build: npm run build:lib; npm run build:app; npm run build:sub
scripts.clean:sub: if [ -n "${npm_config_main}" ] && [ -n  "${npm_config_sub}" ]; then for sub in ${npm_config_sub//,/ }; do rm ../${npm_config_main}/app/${sub}.js; done; rmdir ../${npm_config_main}/app; fi
scripts.clean:app: if [ -n "${npm_config_main}" ]; then rm ../${npm_config_main}/pico.*; rm ../${npm_config_main}/index.*; rm ../${npm_config_main}/app.js*; rmdir ../${npm_config_main}; fi
scripts.clean: npm run clean:sub; npm run clean:app
